Bags.onlytradeempty: Cannot trade bag unless it's empty!

Banks.inventorynospace: There is no space left in your inventory for that item!

Combat.sleep: You cannot cast this ability whilst asleep

Combat.sleepblocking: You are asleep and can't block.

Combat.stunattacking: You are stunned and can't attack.

Commandoutput.apirevoked: {00} has had their api access revoked!
Commandoutput.apirolenotgranted: Failed to assign api role {00}, api access must be enabled for {01} first!
Commandoutput.apiroleprereq: Api role {00} could not be granted! Depends on {01} role.
Commandoutput.apirolerevoked: {00} has had their {01} api role revoked!
Commandoutput.helpfooter: Type in any command followed by {00} for parameters and usage information.
Commandoutput.invalidparameters: Invalid parameters provided! Use {00} to get more info about a command.
Commandoutput.notfound: Command not recoginized. Enter help for a list of commands. Remember console commands are case sensitive!
Commandoutput.parseerror: Parse Error: Parameter could not be read. Type {00} {01} for usage information.
Commandoutput.syntaxerror: Syntax Error: Expected parameter not found. Type {00} {01} for usage information.

Announcement.Help: sends a global message to all players
Announcement.Description: Sends a global message to all users playing the game.
Announcement.Name: announcement

Api.Help: enables or disables api access for an account
Api.Description: Sets the api access (enabled/disabled) of a selected account. true is enabled, false is disabled
Api.Name: api

ApiGrant.Help: enables extra api access roles for a account. (Options: users.query, users.manage)
ApiGrant.Description: Grants extra api access roles for a user. (Options: users.query, users.manage)
ApiGrant.Name: apigrant

ApiRevoke.Help: revokes extra api access roles for a account. (Options: users.query, users.manage)
ApiRevoke.Description: Revokes extra api access roles for a account. (Options: users.query, users.manage)
ApiRevoke.Name: apirevoke

ApiRoles.Help: lists extra api access roles for an account (Options: users.query, users.manage)
ApiRoles.Description: Lists extra api access roles assigned to a user.
ApiRoles.Name: apiroles

AccessBoolean.Description: whether or not to grant/revoke access
AccessBoolean.Name: access

ApiRole.Description: role to grant or revoke (users.query or users.manage)
ApiRole.Name: role

CpsOperation.Description: one of the following: status, lock, unlock
CpsOperation.Name: operation

EnablementBoolean.Description: whether or not this is enabled
EnablementBoolean.Name: enablement

IpBan.Description: if it is an IP ban (true/false)
IpBan.Name: ip-ban

IpMute.Description: if it is an IP mute (true/false)
IpMute.Name: ip-ban

TargetApi.Description: the name of the acount to change the API access of
TargetApi.Name: account-name

TargetBan.Description: the name of the player to ban
TargetBan.Name: player-name

TargetExperimentalFeature.Description: the Guid or name of the experimental feature to configure
TargetExperimentalFeature.Name: experimental-feature-name-or-id

TargetKick.Description: the name of the player to kick
TargetKick.Name: player-name

TargetKill.Description: the name of the player to kill
TargetKill.Name: player-name

TargetMute.Description: the name of the player to mute
TargetMute.Name: player-name

TargetPower.Description: the name of the player to change the access of
TargetPower.Name: player-name

TargetPowerAccount.Description: the name of the acount to change the access of
TargetPowerAccount.Name: account-name

TargetUnban.Description: the name of the player to unban
TargetUnban.Name: player-name

TargetUnmute.Description: the name of the player to unmute
TargetUnmute.Name: player-name

Ban.Help: bans a player from the server
Ban.Description: Bans a player from the server.
Ban.Name: ban

Cps.Description: Prints the current CPS. The status flag tells if the server loop is locked or unlocked. The lock flag locks the cps while the unlock flag unlocks it.
Cps.Name: cps

Commands.exited: Main server shutdown completed. If your server is stuck you may safely kill it.
Commands.exiting: Server is now closing. Please wait while your game and player data is saved!

Experiments.Help: enables or disables an experimental feature
Experiments.Description: Sets the enablement of an experimental feature. true is enabled, false is disabled
Experiments.Name: experiments

Kick.Help: kicks a player from the server
Kick.Description: Kicks a player from the server.
Kick.Name: kick

Kill.Help: kills a player on the server
Kill.Description: Kills a player on the server.
Kill.Name: kill

Commands.madeprivate: The server has now been made private and can only be accessed by admins. To change this use the makepublic command or edit the adminonly field in config.json
Commands.madepublic: The server has now been made public and can be accessed by all players. To change this use the makepublic command or edit the adminonly field in config.json

MakePrivate.Help: Makes the server private and can only be accessed by admins.
MakePrivate.Description: Makes the server private and can only be accessed by admins.
MakePrivate.Name: makeprivate

MakePublic.Help: Makes the server public to all players.
MakePublic.Description: Makes the server public to all players.
MakePublic.Name: makepublic

Migrate.Help: walks you through migrating your player or game database between sqlite and mysql
Migrate.Description: Walks you through migrating your player or game database between sqlite and mysql.
Migrate.Name: migrate

Mute.Help: mutes a player preventing them from talking
Mute.Description: mutes a player preventing them from talking.
Mute.Name: mute

Errors.BadArgumentFormat: The argument '{00}' is not a valid short or long-form argument.
Errors.CommandNotFound: The command '{00}' is not recoginized. Enter '{01}' for a list of commands.
Errors.DuplicateNamedArgument: The argument '{00}' was specified more than once.
Errors.FlagArgumentsIgnoreValue: '{00}' is a flag argument and will ignore provided values.
Errors.GenericError: An error occurred while trying to parse the command.
Errors.IllegalArgumentFormat: The argument '{00}' matches both the short and long-form argument formats (e.g. '{01}h' and '{02}help').
Errors.InvalidArgumentValue: The value '{00}' is not valid for the argument '{01}'.
Errors.InvalidArgumentValueWithType: The value '{00}' is not valid for the argument '{01}' (expected type '{02}').
Errors.MissingNamedArgument: The argument '{00}{01}' is required for the command '{02}' but is missing.
Errors.MissingPositionalArgument: The argument '{00}' is required for the command '{01}' but is missing.
Errors.NoInput: No input was provided. If this is not the case, please report this error.
Errors.UnhandledNamedArgument: The argument '{00}' is not accepted for the command '{01}'.
Errors.UnhandledPositionalArgument: The argument '{00}' in position {01} is not accepted for the command '{02}'.

Power.Help: sets the administrative access of a user
Power.Description: Sets the power or access of a selected account. Power 0 is regular user. Power 1 is in-game moderator. Power 2 is owner/designer and allows editor access.
Power.Name: power

PowerAccount.Help: sets the administrative access of an account
PowerAccount.Description: Sets the power or access of a selected account. Power 0 is regular user. Power 1 is in-game moderator. Power 2 is owner/designer and allows editor access.
PowerAccount.Name: poweracc

Unban.Help: unbans a player from the server
Unban.Description: Unbans a player from the server.
Unban.Name: unban

Unmute.Help: unmutes a player allowing them to talk
Unmute.Description: unmutes a player allowing them to talk.
Unmute.Name: unmute

Database.usingsqlite: Using SQLite Database for account and data storage.

Errors.ErrorLoadingStrings: Failed to load strings! Press any key to shut down.

Errors.errorservercrashnohalt: The Intersect server has encountered an error and must close. Error information can be found in resources/logs/errors.log.
Errors.errortimeout: Too many failed requests. Please wait and try again!
Errors.floodaverage: [Flood]: 3+ Rapid Detections. Total Detections: {00} [User: {01} | Player: {02} | IP {03}]
Errors.warpfail: Failed to warp player to new map -- warping to spawn.

Events.watchdogkillcommon: Common event killed due to commands processed in a single frame surpassing the Event Watchdog Threshhold.  (Event {00})

Portchecking.accessible: Your game is accesible to the public!
Portchecking.checkantivirus: 2. Antivirus programs might also be blocking connections and you may need to add Intersect Server.exe to your antivirus exclusions.

Portchecking.notaccessible: It does not appear that your game is accessible to the outside world.
Portchecking.notconnected: Could not retreive connection information from AGD servers. Do you have an internet connection?
Portchecking.screwed: 3. If on a college campus, or within a business network you likely do not have permission to open ports or host games in which case you should explore external hosting options!
